about_the_game:
This DLC pack adds new content to the Maid Cafe video game in the following ways:
  • Eight Adult Comic Stories will be available to purchase in-game via the Curiosity Shop.
  • A new mobile app will be added in-game allowing you to read the comics at any time during the game.
  • New dessert crafting recipes will be added to the game.
  • New interactions with Envy in her shop will be added to the game.
The set includes eight new comic issues with full adult content featuring characters from the game.

Each one was specially created as a beautiful and sexy companion to the game and can be viewed and enjoyed within the game itself.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product depicts various sexual acts and sequences between a man and a woman, in the form of comic stories that are added to the game for players to view at any time.

All characters included are over the age of 21.

The DLC adds new content to the game: Maid Cafe.

detailed_description:
This DLC pack adds new content to the Maid Cafe video game in the following ways:
  • Eight Adult Comic Stories will be available to purchase in-game via the Curiosity Shop.
  • A new mobile app will be added in-game allowing you to read the comics at any time during the game.
  • New dessert crafting recipes will be added to the game.
  • New interactions with Envy in her shop will be added to the game.
The set includes eight new comic issues with full adult content featuring characters from the game.

Each one was specially created as a beautiful and sexy companion to the game and can be viewed and enjoyed within the game itself.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz

  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

short_description: New content in the form of comics to collect and read in game, new desserts and new in-game content are added with this DLC. Enjoy the fully uncensored comics within the game at any time as you play via the in-game phone.
